```{r import}

# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************              Open    Data                    *************** #
# **************************************************************************** #

# import data
chain <- read_tsv("~/CAMP/data_prepare/SLURM/pdb_pep_chain")

fasta <- read_tsv("~/CAMP/data_prepare/SLURM/pdbid_all_fasta")


```

```{r import}

# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************              Subset to Demo Data             *************** #
# **************************************************************************** #

# PPDbench: https://webs.iiitd.edu.in/raghava/ppdbench/dataset.php
# ligands (133)

pdb_id_demo=c("1cjr","1cvu")

# subset data
demo.c <- chain %>%
  filter(PDB_id %in% pdb_id_demo) %>%
   write_delim(file="pdb_pep_chain_demo", delim = "\t")

# subset data
demo.f <- fasta %>%
  filter(PDB_id %in% pdb_id_demo) %>%
  write_delim(file="pdbid_all_fasta_demo", delim = "\t")



```
